H0.text: Meryl Streep's character, Miranda, in the 2006 film The Devil Wears Prada was based on the editor-in-chief of which fashion magazine. Harper's Bazaar

H1.text: Meryl Streep's character, Miranda, in the 2006 film The Devil Wears Prada was based on the editor-in-chief of which fashion magazine. Elle

H2.text: Meryl Streep's character, Miranda, in the 2006 film The Devil Wears Prada was based on the editor-in-chief of which fashion magazine. W Magazine

H3.text: Meryl Streep's character, Miranda, in the 2006 film The Devil Wears Prada was based on the editor-in-chief of which fashion magazine. Vogue

A4.text: The central character resembled Weisberger, and her boss was a powerful editor-in-chief of a fictionalized version of Vogue.
